title: 43 How Pei Wei’s Clean-Label Initiative is Pushing Menu Transparency in the Restaurant Industry
description: On this episode of The Barron Report, Paul Barron is joined by Chief Marketing Officer of Pei Wei, Brandon Solano, to discuss Pei Wei’s clean-label initiative and supply chain challenges that go along with it.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
